divs: Sighting Detailsoutside a big bright flash (star shape) in southwest sky towards buzzards bay.. i saw this before about 2 weeks ago. it caught my attention. kept a eye for it to happen again. didnt. tonight outside smoking a cigar. looked up watchin the the night sky. its dark in new england this time of year. couldnt belive it, saw it again. different location more to right in the sky. bright flash.(star like) lasted 2 seconds just like before. went in told my wife about the past one and now this, got my biccnuc"s hung outside for a few.. nothing. so about 20 minutes later takin the trash out just happened to look up when "flash bright light" again in a different location 40 degrees to where i saw it before... very strange..wasnt a tele-communacation satalite wasnt a plane wasnt a falling star. lived on army bases in south pacfic and seen missle testing etc. this was very werid.
Summary: bright flash seen in sky 3 x over the past 3 weeks, different locations
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Bourne
There were no other sightings in Bourne on or around December 26th 2011
